channel.title: [delta] please help with this [delta]
channel.description:
alright, we all know that bomb's cheat client is starting to be used more and more on servers lately. (that i've known of)
i was wondering... If someone can explain a way to either, not allow bomb's cheat client. Or make it where you can only enter in a specific number of letters/numbers for your name.
Thanks.

item.title: [delta] please help with this [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

lol it’s fine bro. Anyway… pm me your msn? i’ll add you right now.

You just made my day lmao.

Read full topic

item.title: [delta] please help with this [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

[quote=“Jddogg9, post:4, topic:302123”][quote author=Dell link=topic=398450.msg2956583#msg2956583 date=1252869819]
how to completely block cheat clients , is make it so that ur server only recognizes your own client’s UID so that only ur client will be able to login to ur server.

ill post tut
[/quote]

It’s fine, i know how to do that… My server doesn’t have a “custom cheat client” at the moment. I know a lot of people think silab compatable servers for some reason fail… But in my opinion i like them.

Hey bro I remember you…

Here’s a fix to limit the login to 12 characters anyway…

if(playerName.length() > 12){
returnCode = 11;
disconnected = true;
savefile = false;
}

thank you so much bro. And where do you remember me from?

Play my server? o.o[/quote]

Nah I’m owner of Massacred World, and we used to be like enemys and then I said you’re a pretty cool guy, then you came in xat and said you added me on msn BUT NEVER DID lol.

/mylifestory

Oh yeah sorry we got the same home as you now, LEECHLEECHLEECH

Read full topic

Play my server? o.o
